echo "# Weather App

## Setup

1. Clone the repo:
   \`\`\`
   git clone https://github.com/ShardulDhiwar/weather-app.git
   \`\`\`

2. Create a \`.env\` file:
   \`\`\`
   VITE_WEATHER_API_KEY=your_openweathermap_api_key
   \`\`\`

3. Install dependencies and run:
   \`\`\`
   npm install
   npm run start
   \`\`\`

## Build
\`\`\`
npm run build
\`\`\`
" > README.md
